2.「おお レーノス ちょうどいいところに。| お前さんと <pc>で 組んで| や: Oh, Llanos, just as well. I have a job I|need you and <pc> to do|together.

3.「はあっ？ この新米とぉ！？| んなの ユウギリに 任せときゃいいのに……。: Huh? With this newbie? Why don't you just|leave that to Yugiri?

4.「先日 ユウギリからの報告で| モリナラ大森林の樹木が 許可なく| 伐採されてい: A few days ago, Yugiri reported that trees|in the Great Forest of Morinara were being|cut down without permission.

5.「今回の任務は この犯人を見つけだし| 不法な伐採を やめさせることじゃ。| ふ: Our mission is to find this criminal and put|an end to illegal logging. We'll work|together to do our best!

6.「……うーくっくっくっ。| 伐採をやめさせるよう がんばっさい！| ……くっくっ: ... Wookkkkk. Let's try to stop them from|cutting down the trees! ... Kkkkk.

7.「オレひとりで 充分ですって。| こんな新米 連れてったら うまくいくものも|: I'm good enough on my own. If you take a|newbie like this, you'll ruin everything|that could go wrong.

8.「ちゅーわけで オレは ひとりで行くからよ。| お前は お前で 好きにしな。: So I'm going alone. I like you.

9.「なんだ あのレーノスってのは？| いちいち 相棒のことを 半人前あつかいして|: What's with that Llanos guy? He's so|annoying, treating his partner like he's|half a man.

10.「おおかた 選ばれし レンジャーである| 相棒に シットしてるんだろうぜ。| ハ: Mostly I'm sitting on a buddy who is a|Chosen Ranger. Hahan! You're small.

11.「まあまあ スピルどの。| レーノスは あれで 優秀なレンジャー。| 彼なりの考: So-so. Spi. Llanos is a good Len. He's got|his own ideas.

12.「……で レーノスの奴は ああ言っておったが| お前さんは どうする <pc>？: ... So, Llanos said yes, but what about you,|<pc>? Are you willing to take|on this assignment?

13.「それでは 頼んだぞ。| まずは 先日見つけたという 切り株が| たくさんある場: Then, please... First of all, you should go|to the place with the many stumps you found|the other day.

14.「では 頼んだぞ……と思ったら| なんじゃ その 頼まれごとの数は！？: Okay, here's the deal... But what's with all|the favors you're getting?

15.「それでは 仕事のひとつも 頼めんぞ！| ええい。さっさと 手を空けてくるのじゃ: I can't even ask you to do one more job! .|Now go get your hands off me!

16.「選ばれし レンジャーの任務としては| 役不足というわけか。強気じゃのう。| 部: It's not enough to be the chosen ranger for|the job. Bullshit. My men are turning into|Teng.

17.「……うーくっくっくっ。| テングになって まいっテング！| ……くっくっくっ。: ... Wookkkkk. I'll be Teng. I'll be Teng.|I'll be Teng! ... Kukkuk.

18.「やっぱり お前も 来たのか。| チッ！ オレひとりで 充分だってのに| 足手ま: I knew you'd come too. Shit! I'm good enough|on my own, but you're slowing me down.

19.「おうおう だまって聞いてりゃ| さっきから ずいぶんと うちの相棒を| こき下: Oh, oh, just listen to the way you're|talking down to my partner...

20.<if_woman>「たしかに 相棒は ボンヤリしたとこもあるが| このオレ様が: <if_woman>Yes, my partner is a little fuzzy at times,|but I'll take my word for it. He's a better|ranger than you are!<else>Yes, my partner is a little fuzzy at times,|but I'll take my word for it. He's a better|ranger than you are!<endif>

21.「フン……こいつが ウワサの精霊か。| いい機会だ。ぜひとも その才能ってやつを: Hmm... This is the guy I've been hearing|about. Nice. Let's see him prove his talent.

22.「今から オレは この広大な森の中から| 木を伐採した犯人を 見つけだすからよ。: From now on, I'm going to find the person|who cut down the trees in this vast forest.|You're on your own.

23.「それでもし オレよりも先に| 犯人を見つけだすことが できたなら| お前のこと: If you can find the culprit before I do,|I'll give you the benefit of the doubt.

24.「まあ この森は オレにとっちゃ| 庭みてーなもんだ。| やる前から 勝負は見え: Well, this forest is like a garden to me. I|know what I'm doing before I do it.

26.「こらーっ！| お前ら 何してやがる！！: Hey! What the hell are you guys doing!

27.「やべえ！ レンジャー協会だっ！: Oh no! It's the Ranger Association!

30.「オレたちは 伐採同盟。| 自らの自由意思で 森を切りひらき| 未来をも 切りひ: We're logging. We are the organization that,|of our own free will, will cut our forests|and our future!

31.「なーにが 伐採同盟だ！| ようするに 無法者の集まりじゃねーか！: What the hell is the Logging Alliance? In|short, a bunch of outlaws!

32.「モリナラ大森林の自然を守る| エルトナ・レンジャー協会 モリナラ支部の| <c:
of the Eltona Ranger|Association, Morinara Chapter, the Nature|Conservancy of the Great Forest of Molinara,|
|will take care of it!

33.「自然を守る……か。笑わせるな！| 森は ヒトの侵入を拒む 危険な領域だ！| そ:
Protecting Nature... Don't make me laugh!|The forest is a dangerous area that refuses|to be invaded by humans! We don't need to|
|protect that!

34.「な なに 勝手なこと言ってやがる！| 森は 地上に生きる すべての生物にとって: What are you talking out of your backside!|The forest is an irreplaceable place for|every living thing on earth!

35.「……しょせん わかりあえないか。| やはり 貴様らとは 戦うしかないようだ。|: ... We'll never understand each other. I|still have to fight you. Let's go, logging|machine!

36.「また レンジャー協会が 来やがったぜ！: The Ranger Association is at it again!

38.「フン！ | 何度来ようと けちらしてやるだけだ！| さあ 行けっ 伐採マシィィ: Hmph! No matter how many times they come,|we'll just keep kicking their asses! Come|on, go, logging machine!

39.「くそっ！| 伐採同盟の奴ら 相棒が 戦っている間に| とっとと 逃げちまったよ: Damn it! The Logging Alliance got away while|my partner was fighting.

40.「よっ！ ご苦労だったな。: Yo! Thanks for your hard work.

41.「今ごろ やっと ご到着かよ。| オメーが ノロノロしてる間に| 相棒は 犯人を: By now, you've finally arrived. While you|were slowing down, my partner found the|killer!

42.「なーに チョーシこいてやがる！| お前らが 来たときには オレは とっくに|: What the fuck are you doing? I was long gone|by the time you got here, so I had to lay|low.

44.「連中のアジトをつきとめようと 隠れてたのに| お前が しゃしゃり出てきて 暴れ:
I was hiding to find out where they were|hiding, and then you came running out of|nowhere, and I was wondering what was going|
|to happen.

45.「まっ 結局 ヤツらが 逃げだして| 後をつけれたから アジトは判明したけどな。: Well, they eventually got away and we were|able to follow them, so we found out where|they were hiding. So it all worked out.

46.「くっ……。じゃ じゃあ 今すぐ| そのアジトに 突入して| 伐採同盟の連中 と: Damn. Then let's break into that hideout|right now and take down those logging gangs!

47.「……ったく これだから シロートは。| 見たとこ あいつらは かなりの大人数だ: ... That's why White's here. From the looks|of it, they're pretty big. There's no way|we're going in alone.

48.「とりあえず アジトの場所を報告して| 後は 支部長の判断に まかせんぞ。| こ: I'll report the location of their hideout|and leave the rest to the branch manager. We|can't handle this guy.

49.「む～っ。ただの チャラい奴かと思ってたが| なかなか やるじゃねーか。| ……: . I thought he was just a player, but he's|pretty good. I'll tell you what... I don't|like what you're saying.

50.「しかたねえ。あいつの言うとおり| 今は 支部に戻るとしよーぜ 相棒。: Only. He's right. We'll go back to the|branch now.

52.「しかし 伐採同盟とはのう……。| そんな同盟と戦うことになるなんて| どう 命: But a logging alliance? I don't know what|I'll do if I have to fight such an alliance.

53.「……うーくっくっくっ。| 同盟と戦うのを どう命じるか……| くっくっくっ。: ... Wookkkkk. How can I order you to fight|the Alliance... Ugh.

54.「なんだ よーやく 戻ったのか。| ずいぶん ごゆっくりだったな。: What the hell. We're finally back. You're|taking your time.

55.「そうだ 支部長。| 例の任務は こいつに任せちゃどうです？: That's right. Why don't you let him take|care of that mission?

56.「……ふーむ そうじゃのう。| ユウギリだと 道に迷いそうじゃし| <pc>が: ... Hmmm... If we use Yugiri, we might get|lost, and <pc> might be better|suited.

57.「じゃ そういうことで！| オレは 連中のアジトの| 見張りに 行ってきますよ。: Well, then, that's that! I'm going to go|guard their hideout.

59.「うむ。じつは レーノスの報告から| 伐採同盟を 相手にするのに| この支部だけ: Mm. In fact, based on Llanos' report, we|don't have enough men in this branch to deal|with the logging alliance.

60.「王都カミハルムイの レンジャー本部に| 書状を出して 援軍を頼むことにしたんじ: I've decided to write to the ranger|headquarters in Kamikhalmui, the royal|capital, and ask for reinforcements.

61.「……で その書状を届ける役目を| <pc>に 頼もうということに| なったわけ: ... So we decided to ask <pc>|to deliver the letter.

62.「遠いところ すまんが これを届けるまでを| 今回の任務とさせてもらおう。| よ: I'm sorry it's a long way from here, but I'm|afraid I'm going to have to deliver this to|you. <pc>!

64.「なーんか 相棒ってば メンドーな仕事を| 押しつけられたみたいだなぁ。| 悪い: I feel like I'm being forced to do a lot of|work, partner. I'm sorry. I'll take the rest|of the day off.

65.「やれやれ スピルどのは 手きびしいな。| だが このままでは いつか 森の怒り: Oh, man, Spiel is a handful. But if he|doesn't, one day the forest will explode...|We must do our best to avoid that.
